hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#WildFly 12.0 source /home/test/.bashrc sudo yum install -y git wget tar java-1.8.0-ibm-devel.s390x java-1.8.0-ibm.s390x curl export WORK_DIR=`pwd` cd $WORK_DIR
#Install Maven wget https://archive.apache.org/dist/maven/maven-3/3.3.9/binaries/apache-maven-3.3.9-bin.tar.gz tar -xvzf apache-maven-3.3.9-bin.tar.gz
#Get WildFly Source Code cd $WORK_DIR git clone https://github.com/wildfly/wildfly.git cd wildfly git checkout 12.0.0.Final
#Set the environment variables export M2_HOME=$WORK_DIR/apache-maven-3.3.9 export MAVEN_OPTS="-Xmx512m -XX:MaxPermSize=1024m" export JBOSS_HOME=$WORK_DIR/wildfly/build/target/wildfly-12.0.0.Final/ export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-ibm export PATH=$M2_HOME/bin:$JAVA_HOME/bin:$WORK_DIR/wildfly/build/target/wildfly-12.0.0.Final/bin:$PATH java -version
#Install wildfly cd $WORK_DIR/wildfly cp pom.xml pom.xml.org #sed -i '2263i \\t\t\ \</exclusion>' pom.xml #sed -i '2263i \\t\t\t\ \<artifactId>xalan</artifactId>' pom.xml #sed -i '2263i \\t\t\t\ \<groupId>xalan</groupId>' pom.xml #sed -i '2263i \\t\t\ \<exclusion>' pom.xml mvn install
#Verification # Start server in stand alone mode nohup sh ./dist/target/wildfly-12.0.0.Final/bin/standalone.sh -b 0.0.0.0 -bmanagement 0.0.0.0 & sleep 60s curl http://localhost:8080 sleep 60s
pgrep -d" " -f "wildfly" | xargs kill;
sleep 20s # Start server in domain mode nohup sh ./dist/target/wildfly-12.0.0.Final/bin/domain.sh -b 0.0.0.0 -bmanagement 0.0.0.0 & sleep 60s
sleep 60s # Check server response curl http://localhost:8080
